required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Influence of the Biological Maturation on the Antrhopometric Variables and Sport Performance in Volleyball Players
clinical_study.official_title: Influence of the Biological Maturation on the Antrhopometric Variables and Sport Performance in Volleyball Players

lead_sponsor.agency: Universidad Católica San Antonio de Murcia

clinical_study.source: Universidad Católica San Antonio de Murcia

brief_summary.textblock: The project consists of a cross-sectional study in which anthropometric variables, general and specific performance variables of volleyball will be measured, and the biological maturity stage will be calculated. The main objective is to establish a relationship between the biological maturation state, the anthropometric characteristics and the performance in physical fitness tests in volleyball players between 12 and 15 years of age. To do this, there will be all the clubs in the Region of Murcia that have federated teams in these categories.

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Qualitative assessement of the individual sport performance, taking on account the team position on the league and the role of the player in the team. The instrument used to assess this variable will be a questionnaire and the result will be expressed in points (1 to 5 points).

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Calculated with anthropometric variables. The result obtained indicates the time left to the growth peak or the time that has passed from the growth peak

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Muscle mass will be assessed with the corresponding formulas. The result will be expressed in kilograms

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Fat mass will be assessed with the corresponding formulas. The result will be expressed in kilograms

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 1 year
primary_outcome.description: Bone mass will be assessed with the corresponding formulas. The result will be expressed in kilograms.

intervention.description: There is no intervention due to the observational, cross-sectional design of the study

study_pop.textblock: The sample objetive of the present study are all the volleyball players of Región of Murcia, Spain, that meet the inclusion criteria and voluntarily decide to take part in the study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- To play volleyball in a regular basis
- To have between 12 and 15 years
- To participate in volleiball competitions with the team
Exclusion Criteria:
- To be injured in the moment of the measurement session
- To have skipped most of the training sessions the last month
- To have less than a year of experience playing volleyball

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Universidad Católica San Antonio de Murcia
